info.title: Service Entry Sheet (Lean Services)
info.description: This service enables a remote system to read, create and update service entry sheets from or in the SAP S/4HANA Cloud system. It also provides service nodes to submit a service entry sheet for approval, withdraw a service entry sheet from approval or revoke approval of an already approved service entry sheet.

x-sap-shortText: Create, read and update service entry sheets from or in the SAP S/4HANA Cloud system using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: [Service and Material Procurement - Project-Based Services(J13)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/J13 " Link To BP ")

x-sap-extensible.description:
API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Procurement: Service Entry Sheet Header (MMPUR_SES_HEADER)
* Procurement: Service Entry Sheet Item (MMPUR_SES_ITEM)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)

get.summary: Reads the header data from all service entry sheets.
get.description: Reads the header data from all service entry sheets. You can show or skip a defined number of entries, filter and order entries by property values, include a count of entries, select properties to be returned, and expand related entities.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Expand related entities, see [Expand](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=63)

post.description: Creates a service entry sheet with your own data. You can include values such as purchase order, performance date, and service performer.

parameters.name: ServiceEntrySheet
parameters.description: Service Entry Sheet

get.summary: Reads a specified service entry sheet.
get.description: Reads the specified service entry sheet. You can select properties to be returned and expand related entities.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Expand related entities, see [Expand](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=63)

patch.summary: Updates a specified service entry sheet.
patch.description: Updates the specified service entry sheet. You can update values such as service entry sheet name, performance date, service performer, and quantity.

parameters.name: ServiceEntrySheet
parameters.description: Service Entry Sheet

get.summary: Reads the items from a specified service entry sheet.
get.description: Reads the items from the specified service entry sheet. You can show only or skip the first n items, filter items by property values, include a count of items, order items by property values, select properties to be returned, and expand related entities.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Expand related entities, see [Expand](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=63)

get.summary: Reads all service entry sheet items.
get.description: Reads all service entry sheet items. You can show only the first n items, skip the first n items, filter items by property values, include a count of items, order items by property values, select properties to be returned, and expand related entities.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

get.summary: Reads a specified service entry sheet item.
get.description: Reads the specified item from the specified service entry sheet. You can select properties to be returned and expand related entities.

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.summary: Updates a specified service entry sheet item.
patch.description: Updates the specified item from the specified service entry sheet. You can select properties to be returned and expand related entities.

parameters.name: ServiceEntrySheet
parameters.description: Service Entry Sheet

parameters.name: ServiceEntrySheetItem
parameters.description: Item Number of Service Entry Sheet

get.summary: Reads the account assignment(s) from a specified service entry sheet item.
get.description: Reads the account assignment(s) of the specified item from the specified service entry sheet. You can show only or skip the first n account assignments, filter and order by property values, include a count, and select properties to be returned.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Reads all account assignments of service entry sheets.
get.description: Reads all account assignments of service entry sheets. You can show only or skip the first n account assignments, filter and order account assignments by property values, include a count of account assignments, and select properties to be returned.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: ServiceEntrySheet
parameters.description: Service Entry Sheet

parameters.name: ServiceEntrySheetItem
parameters.description: Item Number of Service Entry Sheet

parameters.name: AccountAssignment
parameters.description: Sequential Number of Account Assignment

get.description: Reads the specified account assignment of the specified item from the specified service entry sheet. You can select the properties to be returned.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.description: Updates the specified account assignment of the specified item from the specified service entry sheet. You can update values such as G/L account, cost center, functional area, service order, and WBS element.

post.summary: Submits a service entry sheet for approval.
post.description: Submits a service entry sheet for approval, triggering an approval workflow process.

parameters.name: ServiceEntrySheet
parameters.description:
Service Entry Sheet  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

post.summary: Revokes the approval of a service entry sheet.
post.description: Revokes approval of a service entry sheet that has already been approved and cancels the goods receipt. The service entry sheet then has the status In Process, allowing you to change it.

parameters.name: ServiceEntrySheet
parameters.description:
Service Entry Sheet  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: PostingDate
parameters.description:
Posting Date  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

post.summary: Withdraws a service entry sheet from the approval process.
post.description: Withdraws a service entry sheet from the approval process. The service entry sheet then has the status In Process, allowing you to change it.

parameters.name: ServiceEntrySheet
parameters.description:
Service Entry Sheet  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_ServiceEntrySheet HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--response-separator--
